org.lapps.annotatedcorpus

Interface AnnotatedCorpus


  • public interface AnnotatedCorpus
    The Interface AnnotatedCorpus represents a ranked list of documents with annotations. The implementation of this interface may store document id (and/or spans) itself and/or caching with CorpusCachingStrategy.
    Author:
    Di Wang

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AnnotatedDocument getDocument(ViewOptions options, java.lang.String documentID)
      Gets one document by documentID.
      DocumentStreamReader getDocumentStreamReader(ViewOptions options)
      Gets the document stream reader of current corpus.
      AnnotatedCorpus subCorpus(CorpusQuery query)
      Gets a subset of corpus selected by input query.

      • getDocumentStreamReader

        DocumentStreamReader getDocumentStreamReader(ViewOptions options)
        Gets the document stream reader of current corpus.
        Parameters:
        options - the options that specify how to present each document such as returning "doc id", "doc content", "annotation", "annotation spans", etc.
        Returns:
        the document stream reader
